concept.title: Bootstrap Library
concept.shortdesc: TokenScript's bootstrap library allows a website to use TokenScripts without the user-agent supporting TokenScript.

conbody.p: TokenScript is an interoperability layer to make tokens work on various websites and wallets. If a user-agent supports TokenScript, the token functionalities will be carried out with the browser support.
If the user-agent doesn't support TokenScript, a bootstrap library can be deployed on the website that uses TokenScript technology to enable much of TokenScript's functionality.

Bootstrap Library provides support most TokenScript functions, like , and . However, it can't replace the TokenScript support in the user-agents, because it is deployed on the website as JavaScript library, it can't fully support the tokenscript features . For example, if an produces a zero-knowledge proof, the knowledge would be leaked to the website as the website can access the runtime memory, therefore doing away the Privacy feature (P in .)
